author: .vbuterin
content: > Shouldn't the ShardHeader be unique with respect to (slot, shard)? There is just one shard proposer for (slot, shard) who may publish just one ShardHeader (else he is subject to be slashed). Why we are looking for other pending_headers with the same (slot, shard) then?

author: .vbuterin
content: It's to cover the possibility that there is a dishonest shard proposer that made two headers (and ended up getting slashed)

author: .vbuterin
content: Basically, we want it to be the case that if you see some shard header H1 along with 2/3 votes for it published in the network but not yet included in a beacon block, you can still treat it as confirmed, because even if the shard proposer also proposes H2, and the next beacon proposer is compliant and includes H2 first, H1 and its votes can still get in and win
